module.name: Themes
module.short: Implements Theme Services for supported platforms / widgetsets.

descr.p: themes.pas contains an implementation of TThemeServices which is a designed to manage all necessary aspects of the Windows XP (and up) theme APIs. The component is responsible for loading and unloading of the theme DLL and offers properties and methods to test for various aspects of the theme APIs and to ease painting of themed window content.

The TThemeServices class is designed to work for controls which need XP-like painting. It does not manipulate any VCL class (for this task TThemeManager is responsible) and can be used standalone (also as general support tool in an application). Using the global ThemeServices function you can implicitely create and use a single instance of the class. Theme Manager uses the same approach.
The original file name ThemeSrv.pas was changed to themes.pas to be compatible with Delphi. Adapted for Lazarus by the Lazarus Team.
The initial developer of the original code is: Mike Lischke (public@soft-gems.net, www.soft-gems.net).

element.name: TThemedElement
element.short: Represents elements which can be themed.

element.name: TThemedButton
element.short: Represents theme elements for buttons.

element.name: TThemedClock
element.short: Represents theme elements for a Clock.

element.name: TThemedComboBox
element.short: Represents theme elemenets used to theme combo-box controls.

element.name: TThemedEdit
element.short: Represents theme elements used to theme Edit controls.

element.name: TThemedExplorerBar
element.short: Represents theme elements used to theme an Explorer Bar.

element.name: TThemedHeader
element.short: Represents theme elements used to theme a Header control.

element.name: TThemedListview
element.short: Represents theme elements used to theme List View controls.

element.name: TThemedMenu
element.short: Represents theme elements used to theme Menus.

element.name: TThemedPage
element.short: Represents theme elements used for themed Page controls.

element.name: TThemedProgress
element.short: Represents theme elements used to theme progress bar controls.

element.name: TThemedRebar
element.short: Represents theme elements used to theme Rebar controls.

element.name: TThemedScrollBar
element.short: Represents theme elements used to theme scroll bars.

element.name: TThemedSpin
element.short: Represents theme elements used to theme spin button controls.

element.name: TThemedStartPanel
element.short: Represents theme elements used to theme the Start Panel.

element.name: TThemedStatus
element.short: Represents theme elements used to theme status bars.

element.name: TThemedTab
element.short: Represents theme elements used to theme Tab controls.

element.name: TThemedTaskBand
element.short: Represents theme elements used to theme task bar bands.

element.name: TThemedTaskBar
element.short: Represents theme elements used to theme Task bars.

element.name: TThemedToolBar
element.short: Represents theme elements used to theme tool bars.

element.name: TThemedToolTip
element.short: Represents theme elements used to theme tool tips.

element.name: TThemedTrackBar
element.short: Represents theme elements used to theme track bars.

element.name: TThemedTrayNotify
element.short: Represents theme elements used to theme tray notifications.

element.name: TThemedTreeview
element.short: Represents theme elements used to theme tree view controls.

element.name: TThemedWindow
element.short: Represents theme elements used to theme Windows.

element.name: PThemedElementDetails
element.short: Pointer to a TThemedElementDetails instance.

element.name: TThemedElementDetails
element.short: Record type with a theme element, part, and state values.

element.name: TThemeOption.toShowButtonImages
element.short: Show images on buttons.

element.name: TThemeOption.toShowMenuImages
element.short: show images on menus.

element.name: TThemeOption.toUseGlyphEffects
element.short: Use hot / down effects on (button) glyphs.

element.name: TThemeServices
element.short: Implements theme services for supported platforms.

descr.p: TThemeServices is a small foot print class to provide the user with pure Windows XP theme related abilities like painting elements and text, or retrieving theme element details.

element.name: TThemeServices.InitThemes
element.short: Always returns False.

element.name: TThemeServices.InitThemes.Result
element.short: Always returns False.

element.name: TThemeServices.UnloadThemeData
element.short: An empty implementation in TThemeServices.

element.name: TThemeServices.UseThemes
element.short: Always returns False.

element.name: TThemeServices.UseThemes.Result
element.short: Always returns False.

element.name: TThemeServices.ThemedControlsEnabled
element.short: Always returns False.

element.name: TThemeServices.ThemedControlsEnabled.Result
element.short: Always returns False.

element.name: TThemeServices.InternalColorToRGB
element.short: Converts the numeric color value to color reference.

element.name: TThemeServices.InternalColorToRGB.Result
element.short: Cardinal color reference as defined in the LCLType unit.

element.name: TThemeServices.InternalColorToRGB.Details
element.short: Not used in the method.

element.name: TThemeServices.InternalColorToRGB.Color
element.short: Numeric color value converted in the method.

element.name: TThemeServices.InternalDrawParentBackground
element.short: An empty implementation in TThemeServices.

element.name: TThemeServices.Create
element.short: Constructor for the class instance.

descr.p: Calls InitThemes to detrmine if theme data is available. Sets the value in the ThemesAvailable property. Calls UpdateThemes to load theme data.

element.name: TThemeServices.Destroy
element.short: Destructor for the class instance.

element.name: TThemeServices.IntfDoOnThemeChange
element.short: Signals the OnThemeChange event handler (when assigned).

element.name: TThemeServices.IsDisabled
element.short: Indicates if the theme element value in Details is in a disabled state.

element.name: TThemeServices.IsPushed
element.short: Indicates if the theme element value in Details is in a pushed state.

element.name: TThemeServices.IsHot
element.short: Indicates if the theme element value in Details is in a hot or hovered state.

element.name: TThemeServices.IsChecked
element.short: Indicates if the theme element value in Details is in a checked state.

element.name: TThemeServices.IsMixed
element.short: Indicates if the theme element value in Details has more than one theming state.

element.name: TThemeServices.GetElementDetails
element.short: Fills members in the theme element details.

element.name: TThemeServices.GetDetailSize
element.short: Gets the default dimensions for a theme element detail.

descr.p: Gets the default size for a theme element detail. -1 in the Width and Height for the TSize instance means the size for the theme element detail is not known.

element.name: TThemeServices.GetDetailRegion
element.short: Gets the handle to the region for a theme element.

element.name: TThemeServices.GetStockImage
element.short: Always returns False.

element.name: TThemeServices.GetOption
element.short: Returns 1 if the theme option is used for the platform, or 0 when not used.

descr.p: Use of toUseGlyphEffects is OS-dependent. The option is used for Linux. It is not used for Windows or OSX.

element.name: TThemeServices.GetTextExtent
element.short: Calculates the bounding rectangle for the text or caption in a theme element.

element.name: TThemeServices.ColorToRGB
element.short: Converts a TColor value to the Cardinal color constant needed for a theme element detail.

element.name: TThemeServices.ContentRect
element.short: Adjusts the bounding rectangle for a theme element to contain the content area only.

element.name: TThemeServices.DrawEdge
element.short: Default drawing for the edges on a themed element.

element.name: TThemeServices.DrawElement
element.short: Draws a theme element using the specified theme element details.

element.name: TThemeServices.DrawIcon
element.short: Draws the icon for a theme element.

descr.p: Overloaded to provide WIndows and non-Windows variants. Overridden in the TWin32ThemeServices descendant for compatability with Delphi.

element.name: TThemeServices.DrawParentBackground
element.short: Draws a parent background using the specified window handle and device context.

element.name: TThemeServices.DrawText
element.short: Draws the text for a themed control.

descr.p: DrawText is an overloaded method used to draw the text or caption for a themed control.

element.name: TThemeServices.HasTransparentParts
element.short: Always returns True.

element.name: TThemeServices.PaintBorder
element.short: Default painting method for the borders for a control.

descr.p: PaintBorder has an empty implementation in TThemeServices. It must be overridden in a descendent class to use the native border drawing style for the widgetset.

element.name: TThemeServices.UpdateThemes
element.short: Reloads theme elements and details when UseThemes is True.

descr.p: Called from the Create constructor. Think of it as the theme counterpart for the Loaded method used for components.

element.name: TThemeServices.DottedBrush
element.short: Bitmap Handle for the Dotted Pattern Brush used to draw theme elements.

element.name: TThemeServices.ThemesAvailable
element.short: Indicates if theme data is available.

element.name: TThemeServices.ThemesEnabled
element.short: Indicates if themes are enabled for the platform.

element.name: TThemeServices.OnThemeChange
element.short: Event handler signalled when the current window theme has been changed.

descr.p: OnThemeChange is a TNotifyEvent property with the event handler signalled when the current window theme has been changed. Applications must implement and assign an object procedure to the handler to respond to the event notification.

element.name: ThemeServices
element.short: Provides access to the Theme Services singleton for the widgetset.

descr.p: ThemeServices is a TThemeServices function used to get the theme services singleton for the current widgetset. The return value is a TThemeServices descendant which implement the theming API for a specific widgetset / platform.

element.name: ThemeServices.Result
element.short: TThemeServices instance for the widgetset.

element.name: ThemedElementDetailsEqual
element.short: Compares the content for the specified theme element detail arguments.

element.name: ThemeManagerCopyright
element.short: Copyright information for the theme manager code.

descr.p: Do not modify the copyright in any way! Usage of this unit is prohibited without the copyright notice in the compiled binary file.

element.name: TThemesImageDrawEvent
element.short: Specifies an event handler signalled to draw an image in an image list to a Canvas instance.

descr.p: TThemesImageDrawEvent is the type used for the ThemesImageDrawEvent variable in the unit.

element.name: TThemesImageDrawEvent.AImageList
element.short: Image list with the image drawn in the event handler.

element.name: TThemesImageDrawEvent.ACanvas
element.short: TCanvas instance where the image is drawn.

element.name: TThemesImageDrawEvent.AX
element.short: Horizontal canvas coordinate where the image is drawn.

element.name: TThemesImageDrawEvent.AY
element.short: Vertical canvas coordinate where the image is drawn.

element.name: TThemesImageDrawEvent.AIndex
element.short: Ordinal position in the image list for the image drawn in the event handler.

element.name: TThemesImageDrawEvent.ADrawEffect
element.short: Drawing effect applied to the image.

element.name: TThemesImageDrawEvent.AImageWidth
element.short: Width for the rendered image.

element.name: TThemesImageDrawEvent.ARefControl
element.short: Reference to the control with the Canvas updated in the event handler.

element.name: ThemesImageDrawEvent
element.short: Variable with the event handler signalled to draw a themed image to a Canvas.

descr.p: ThemesImageDrawEvent is a unit global TThemesImageDrawEvent variable with the event handler signalled to draw an image in an imagelist to a Canvas. The value for the variable is assigned in the imglist unit when used in an application.
